description: Defines a service class 'RoomsService' that interacts with an API to retrieve room data using the Dio HTTP client. It includes a method to fetch all available rooms and handles errors accordingly.

classes.name: RoomsService
classes.description: A service class responsible for fetching room data from an API endpoint using Dio.

methods.name: getRooms
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches a list of available rooms from the API endpoint '/rooms', parses the JSON response into Room objects, and returns the list.
